Articles.Content:
I like the scenarios, and I think they are good for training, but I have a problem.

If I make a mistake in the scenarios, I have to:

"Go to

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\saves\scenarios\Mun Orbit

(or equivalent if yours is a non-Steam install)

Close KSP

Delete (or rename) the file persistent.sfs

Load the scenario, and the file will be re-created, and the scenario is reset."

as steam-user sunburnt explained.

This is a bit irritating to have to do many times. (Yes, I am quite a noob )

So if it was possible to make a way of resetting the scenarios in-game, it would be nice .
